Package edu.ou.cs2334.project5.models

Class NonogramModel

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project5.models.NonogramModel
public class NonogramModel extends Object
The NonogramModel stores the state and rules of the game. It stores the row clues, column clues, and the states of the cells.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Henry Malilay

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NonogramModel​(int[][] rowClues, int[][] colClues)
    Instantiates a new nonogram model by initializing new 2D arrays for the row/column clues as well as the cell states.
    NonogramModel​(File file)
    Instantiates a new nonogram model by initializing new 2D arrays for the row/column clues as well as the cell states by reading text from a file.
    NonogramModel​(String filename)
    Instantiates a new nonogram model by initializing new 2D arrays for the row/column clues as well as the cell states by passing the name of the file.

      rowClues - the row clues
      colClues - the column clues

      Instantiates a new nonogram model by initializing new 2D arrays for the row/column clues as well as the cell states by reading text from a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file
      Throws:
      IOException - signals that an IOException has occurred.

    • project

      public static List<Integer> project​(boolean[] cells)
      Returns the nonogram numbers of the cell states based on adjacent true cells.
      Parameters:
      cells - the cells states array as booleans
      Returns:
      the list of the nonogram numbers

    • projectCellStatesRow

      public int[] projectCellStatesRow​(int row)
      Returns an array of the projection of a specific row.
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the row
      Returns:
      the list of nonogram numbers in that row

    • projectCellStatesCol

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the list of nonogram numbers in that column

    • isRowSolved

      public boolean isRowSolved​(int row)
      Checks if the row array matches the projections of the row at a specific location
      Parameters:
      row - the row index
      Returns:
      true if is row solved. otherwise, false

    • isColSolved

      public boolean isColSolved​(int col)
      Checks if the column array matches the projections of the column at a specific location
      Parameters:
      col - the column index
      Returns:
      true if is column solved. otherwise, false

    • isSolved

      public boolean isSolved()
      Checks all the rows and columns are solved
      Returns:
      true, if all the rows and columns are solved (puzzle solved)

    • setCellState

      public boolean setCellState​(int rowIndex, int colIndex, CellState state)
      Sets the cell state at this location. Returns true if the state had changed. Returns false if the puzzle is already solved, the state is null, or the given state is the same as the cell state at given location
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the row index
      colIndex - the column index
      state - the given cell state
      Returns:
      true if the cell state has been updated. otherwise, false

    • resetCells

      public void resetCells()
      Sets all the state of the cells to EMPTY.
